definition: being without sound through injury or illness and thus incapable of all but whispered speech
details:
adjective
- being without sound through injury or illness and thus incapable of all but whispered speech
= synonyms: aphonic
- uttered without voice
= synonyms: breathed
- deprived of the rights of citizenship especially the right to vote
= example: deprived of the rights of citizenship especially the right to vote
= synonyms: disenfranchised, disfranchised, voteless
- produced without vibration of the vocal cords
= synonyms: hard
